ai-patthana18.19:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.19:0.3_0: Propering the opportunity for associated with pollutants,
ai-patthana18.19:1.1_0: Only this teaching is not for the sake of defilement and associated with the defilements. ... for the sake of these three kinds of corruption and for the sake of defilement, because of these three conditions don’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.19:2.1_0: Or he doesn’t associate with definitely. ...
ai-patthana18.19:2.1_2: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.19:3.1_0: And if you’re not able to for the sake of defilement and associated with the Teaching, nor for the sake of a single gathering, or for those without reason. ...
ai-patthana18.19:4.1_0: Or he doesn’t associate with pollutants. ...
ai-patthana18.19:4.1_2: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
